website_summaries.verdict: Not only does this wide and deep toy box make it easy to store and organize a large amount of toys, children will appreciate seeing their favorite characters on display too.
pros: Available in Minnie Mouse, Frozen, and Paw Patrol styles
cons: A little pricy, but it’s a large toy box

customer_reviews.title: For baby and me
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this purchase my toddler received a whole host of new toys for his birthday. Tons of cars and blocks.....anyway his rc cars and other medium toys fit in here and I can now see the floor. This was super easy to assemble looking just at pictures, very quick to assemble and sturdy, and my baby loves his paw patrol. Couldn't be more pleased and for this low price, this can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: GoldenGreek

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bottom, good sides
customer_reviews.text: The flimsy bottom is the only problem with this box. If you are getting it for an older child you may be ok. However, for our 3 year old that likes to climb into things, we had to constantly take it away. The size was quite accommodating for all of her paw patrol toys (or the toddler herself). The lid comes off completely rather than having hinges which was something I didn't consider and don't really think works for us.
customer_reviews.author: 4SDCB

customer_reviews.title: Toys finally have a Home!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just LOVES her new toy box! It's very sturdy & super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: I love having control of how much storage I want by ...
customer_reviews.text: This box rocks! I love having control of how much storage I want by moving the inside pannels. I didnt even put the stickers on. I left it black and blue and it looks just as cool!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: I loved this toy box
customer_reviews.text: At first, I loved this toy box. I've had it for a couple months now and I HATE IT. The stickers bubbled up, creased, and the colors flaked off. The panels do not fit at all. The toy box doesn't stay together. The only way it will work is if I leave it in on place forever because I can't use the bottom panels (the correct way is too big to fit, the other way is too small and they fall out) and I can't divide the toys because the dividers are also the wrong size. I paid $60 for a toy box that appears to have been made with $5. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Witmer

customer_reviews.title: Cute storage box
customer_reviews.text: This toy storage box is really cute! Our daughters love it and it has a ton of room to store toys etc. It was easy to assemble and also easy move from room to room. I am very happy with this product and would definitely recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: christina viquez

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cute toy box!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy box is very well made, very durable.. It was very easy to assemble and quick! The stickers were easy to apply as well.Our little one absolutely loves her Minnie Mouse Toy Box! A great product!! Definitely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA WIEMERS

customer_reviews.title: I am ocd so I love the spacers
customer_reviews.text: holds a bunch of toys. I am ocd so I love the spacers, I try to keep my daughters box organized but she doesn't haha. anyways so far so good and still room to go. she has the small wooden frozen one for her stuffed animals and this for everything else so far...
customer_reviews.author: Shalaine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! Small, doesn't hold much and easily falls apart. The plastic warped very soon and the stickers peeled off almost immediately. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Bottom of toy box is cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I gave this two stars because although I did like the toy box itself, the bottoms was made of two pieces of cheap plastic that kept popping out. Because of this, anytime the toy box was moved (even the slightest amount) the toys were coming out through the bottom. I was very excited to get this because my little girl loves frozen, but very disappointed with its quality.
customer_reviews.author: heather walker

customer_reviews.title: Very adorable and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy box for my Minnie Mouse obsessed two year old! It is perfect to hold all of her toys and the fact that it is a character she really likes makes her want to put her toys away in it even more. It is adorable and was so easy to put together and so far has been very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but really smaller than I was expecting. Doesn’t hold very many toys.
customer_reviews.author: JoyceÂ Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed and this was definitely not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Measurement are not accurate. The w is actually 30" and the rest isn't right either. I was disappointed and this was definitely not worth the price. Don't bother. * weeks later, the sticker on top keeps peeling off.*
customer_reviews.author: Jill V

customer_reviews.title: We love this toy box & so does our daughter
customer_reviews.text: We love this toy box & so does our daughter. The only problem we had was the bottom it kept coming out so I replaced it with a piece of plywood & now it's sturdier much better than before!!
customer_reviews.author: StephanieND89

customer_reviews.title: This was super easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together. Using it to store the babies toys in and she has no problems getting things out or putting them back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I love it and my daughter was so happy to see ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it and my daughter was so happy to see her new chest. It's very easy to assemble and it's sturdy which is perfect for a small child who breaks things quiet often. I think the only thing I can say is that you have to pick up the top of the toy box so for a small child well the just throw it if not care there's nothing to hold the top. It's pretty deep to put many of your child's toys.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Serves it's purpose. A little weak but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy box. Love this product. Stickers came out a little bubbly and keep peeling but super cute and great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: It's okay seems to be a little cheaply made but overall looks durable. Holds a good amount of toys. Wish there was a way to hinge the lid on though.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Ruined decal, flimsy bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Decent storage box. The bottom is very flimsy as a corner cracked from throwing a toy into the box. I used an old crawling mat to help absorb any heavy toys thrown in to protect the plastic. Also, the decal for the toy box came with another decal over it. Spent 10 minutes carefully pealing it off.
customer_reviews.author: Bringtheheat13

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent little toy box. It bows a little bit though otherwise I’d be giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stickers don't stick well
customer_reviews.text: Stickers dont stay on well. A week after I got it the top sticker is already pealing almost all of the way off
customer_reviews.author: jessica gentile

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy box
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy box!! It is pretty big and has dividers that can be used if wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Nice addition to his room. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Built strong . price is a little high for the size of this toy storage
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that stickers came faded
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that stickers came faded, and there was no extra sticker for one long rectangular panel.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves this toybox, smaller than expected, But still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: SHANNON IN TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. The bottom has fallen out several times.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars! Easy to assemble!!! It has so much space!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Sribnyi

customer_reviews.title: Keep toys organized and house clean
customer_reviews.text: Much more sturdier than other life got toyboxes and granddaughters love the decor of Frozen princesses.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hall

customer_reviews.title: Box is nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Box is nice and sturdy, but bottom pieces have enough give that the sides can slide out of place when lifted. Other than that, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mabohka

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 1/2 year old grandson and he absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it cost
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is pretty thin plastic but seems to be sturdy but is pretty light weight so its easy to move
customer_reviews.author: Anna McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, should last a long time. It has plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: sandra l.

customer_reviews.title: Well made but a little smaller than pictured. Lack ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made but a little smaller than pictured. Lack of verbal directions caused confusion regarding sticker placement on panels because determination of top/bottom of panels not realized until steps following that of sticker adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than I thought it would be but it looked good and was sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Nina B

customer_reviews.title: Toys
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the bottom of the toy box is not holdable for the toys
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: ... big as expected and the art stickers peel off easy but I love it for my
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as expected and the art stickers peel off easy but I love it for my son
customer_reviews.author: Alma Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the stickers are very poor quality. The picture of the stickers was faded.
customer_reviews.author: Michael I. Burstein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my boys room and its perfect
customer_reviews.author: RIKEITA GROVE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, i can fit all her toys, really big, don't take too much room
customer_reviews.author: PAinzuain

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not as spacious inside as we had hoped. No way to attach lid and stickers are already crinkled up after only 2 weeks. Overall not awful though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: i want a refund because it's cheaply made with some scuff marks on the side of box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Delta Children Store and Organize Toy Box, Nick Jr. PAW Patrol
product_meta.description: Color:Nick Jr. PAW PatrolThe PAW Patrol is here to help with the cleanup thanks to this Nick Jr. PAW Patrol Store and Organize Toy Box by Delta Children. Featuring bright graphics of Chase, Marshall, Rubble, Rocky and Zuma, this adorable toy box is the ideal spot to store toys large and small. Inside are two dividers that can be rearranged in a number of configurations to easily organize and hide away craft supplies, toys or other accessories. Perfect in a playroom or bedroom, this large toy organizer holds 50% more toys than most, and is constructed of sturdy, blow molded plastic to withstand years of use.
feature_bullets: Recommended for ages 3 to 6 Holds up to 50 pounds of toys
Constructed of sturdy, blow molded plastic Interior features 2 dividers that allow you to customize the size of the sections
Handles on either side make it easy to move from room to room Colorful PAW Patrol decals are on the front, sides and top of the toy box
Assembled dimensions: 33.5 inch W x 15.5 inch H x 15 inch D
Meets or exceeds all safety standards set by the CPSC

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars168 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
